validation.airport-invalid-time: Pickup of an airport service is only available 04:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. time range.

data.address-invalid-place: Please check all addresses for completeness and that they are selected from the suggested options.
data.airport-invalid-place: The airport service is only available from/to Vienna. Please adapt your address input.
data.basic-invalid-email:
Your email address is invalid. Check spelling mistakes and structure:
local-part + @ + host-name + '.' + top-level-domain.
Example: local@host.com
data.basic-invalid-required: Not all necessary data were transferred. Please check your input.

business.primary: The focus is on classic tariff rides in cooperation with the 40100 dispatch service in Vienna. Transport of pets, foldable wheelchairs, strollers, golf bags, and other bulky cargo possible as well.
business.secondary: In addition, I also handle special trips such as courier services and errand trips, flat-rate trips to Vienna or the airport, and long-distance trips to any address domestically and abroad. Long-distance trips are carried out by prior arrangement and under favorable conditions. Furthermore, I offer hourly rentals for city tours and golf trips, optionally including joint play (my handicap: -12.3).
business.workload: I employed 2 people for the duration of my son's studies, otherwise I work individual without employees in form of EPU (en: single person enterprise).

private.first: In the first 21 years after graduating from school, I worked as an engineer both domestically and abroad.
private.second: In the first three years after changing careers, I worked as limited partner (ger: "Kommanditist") at Maxi-Mietwagen and as chauffeur for Taxi GÃ¶ring. After successfully passing the entrepreneurial exam that followed, I established my own taxi business in 1999 as a sole proprietorship (EPU - single-person enterprise).

content.comfort: Elevated seat positions for senior friendly entrance/exit
content.ev: mobility by Skoda Enyaq iV 80 since 2020

order.latency-calc: The first hour waiting time costs 24,00 EUR and every following hour 12,00 EUR. Every half hour or part thereof is charged.
order.licence: Price calculation based on licensed Vienna taxi rate!
order.surcharge-fuel: I accept that additional costs per kilometer for boost charging (DC) will become due for a distance more than 250 km (EUR 0,07/km after 250th km).
order.surcharge-parking: I accept that additional costs for road charges and/or parking will become due if necessary.
order.tenancy-calc: 25 km per hour of rental time are included. Each additional kilometer costs additionally 0,50 EUR.
order.terms: I accept that canceling my order is free only up to 24 hours before the desired time of departure (with taxi). I have to pay 50% of total cost in case of cancelation or unexcused absence within these last 24 hours. If payment is refused, a report will be filed.
order.terms-flatrate: I accept that canceling my order is free only up to 24 hours before the desired time of departure (with taxi). I have to pay 50% of the currently calculated costs ({{fieldValue}},00 EUR) in case of cancelation or unexcused absence within these last 24 hours.
order.warnings: Actual duration and/or distance can vary due to unexpected traffic, construction sites or road accidents.
